speech: You can schedule a meeting online, over the phone, or in person. If you would like more detailed instructions including scheduling online, follow the instructions in this link:  http://century.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/281

Scheduled appointments are typically 30 minutes long and available from 8:00 am - 6:00pm on Monday Thursday and 8:00 am - 3:30pm on Friday. You can now schedule an appointment online to meet with your assigned counselor or advisor by following these steps:

Step 1:  Login into myCentury (use your StarID and Password).

Step 2:  Select the "Make an Advising Appointment" box on the right-hand side.

Step 3:  Select  the "Advising, Counseling and Career Center" link.

Step 4:  Select  the "Schedule a new appointment" tab.
.
Step 5:  Select your assigned advisor/counselor, time, and "Academic" as the appointment type.

Step 6: Write a brief reason for your visit and then select the "Schedule Appointment" button.

Step 7:  Enter your phone number and/or email address for an appointment reminder.
